actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Appropriations.
Committee on Appropriations discharged in Senate.

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Rereferred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to clarify and reaffirm the intent of Congress with respect to the transmission and sale of electric power from energy generated or purchased in the southwestern power area.

summary.text: Requires that electric power in the southwestern power area be sold at agreed points of delivery and at uniform, nondiscriminatory rates. Stipulates that agreed points of delivery shall not be changed unilaterally by the Secretary of the Interior.

titles.title: A bill to clarify and reaffirm the intent of Congress with respect to the transmission and sale of electric power from energy generated or purchased in the southwestern power area.
